00041 /**
00042  * Convert the flow to two digits of precision
00043  * @param f The float value
00044  * @return The float with only two digits of precision
00045  */
00046 float SnpSummaryStats::TwoDigitPrecision(float f)
00047 {
00048     return (float)((floor((f+0.005)*100))/100.0);
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Compute the metrics
00054  */
00055 void SnpSummaryStats::CalculateMetrics(vector<vector<u_int8_t> > &calls, int numSets, vector<vector<float> > &metrics)
00056 {
00057     // Loop over each probe set, calculate and store the results.
00058     for (int iset=0; iset<numSets; iset++)
00059     {
00060         int aa=0;
00061         int ab=0;
00062         int bb=0;
00063         int nc=0;
00064         int nfiles = (int)calls[iset].size();
00065         for (int ifile=0; ifile<nfiles; ifile++)
00066         {
00067             u_int8_t call = calls[iset][ifile];
00068             if (call == ALLELE_A_CALL)
00069                 ++aa;
00070             else if (call == ALLELE_AB_CALL)
00071                 ++ab;
00072             else if (call == ALLELE_B_CALL)
00073                 ++bb;
00074             else
00075                 ++nc;
00076         }
00077         int index=0;
00078         metrics[iset][index++] = TwoDigitPrecision(100.0f * (aa+ab+bb) / nfiles);
00079         metrics[iset][index++] = 100.0f * aa / nfiles;
00080         metrics[iset][index++] = 100.0f * ab / nfiles;
00081         metrics[iset][index++] = 100.0f * bb / nfiles;
00082 
00083                 float freqA = (float)(2*aa + ab) / (2*aa + 2*ab + 2*bb);
00084                 float freqB = (float)(2*bb + ab) / (2*aa + 2*ab + 2*bb);
00085         metrics[iset][index++] = min(freqA, freqB);
00086         metrics[iset][index++] = (float)affxstat::CalcHWEqPValue(aa, ab, bb);
00087     }
00088 }
